es.51_tela-text-01: Que maravilla, deportista. ¡Hemos alcanzado la cima de la montaña! Ahora ya posees, en tu equipaje, todo lo que necesitarás para estar junto a Gerdau en su escalada cultural y estratégica.
es.52_tela-text-01:
Hemos cumplido nuestra aspiración de llegar a la cima de la montaña. Como premio, has desbloqueado tu último video. ¡Tu equipaje está completo!

Haz clic en Equipos para acceder.
es.52_tela-text-02: ¡Deportista, ha sido un placer estar contigo en esta trayectoria cultural!
es.52_tela-text-03: Como recompensa, ganas un logro más. Él está disponible en tu mochila.
es.52_tela-text-04: Deportista, tu rendimiento podría ser mejor En esta etapa,
es.52_tela-text-06: Accede a los equipos de tu mochila para perfeccionar tus conocimientos y mejorar tu preparación con el fin de llegar a la cima de la montaña.
es.52a_tela-text-01: ¿Qué tal comprobar cómo ha sido tu trayectoria? Haz clic sobre nuestra bandera para comprobar tu rendimiento.
es.53_tela-text-03: Ya has notado que, si pensamos en nuestra trayectoria como en una escalada, las montañas serían nuestros desafíos.
es.53_tela-text-04: Lo que está en nuestro corazón y nos mueve es nuestro Propósito.
es.53_tela-text-05: Para que logremos escalar esta montaña, necesitamos cargar en nuestra mochila los factores decisivos.
es.53_tela-text-06: Los Pilares Estratégicos son el camino que vamos a recorrer. Ellos ejemplifican cómo vamos a lograr nuestro objetivo.
es.53_tela-text-07: Para que tengamos éxito, necesitaremos añadir también nuevos comportamientos a nuestro equipaje.
es.53_tela-text-08: Sabremos si estamos en el camino correcto observando los indicadores. Ellos serán nuestro GPS, mostrándonos si estamos rumbeando hacia nuestro objetivo.
es.54_tela-text-04: En 10 años, seremos una de las empresas de la cadena del acero más rentables y admiradas en el mundo, y una de las más relevantes en las Américas.
es.55_tela-text-04: La aspiración para el futuro que crearemos juntos nos conduce otra vez a compararla con nuestra escalada: nuestro desafío no se termina en la primera montaña. Tenemos varias por escalar, una luego de la otra.
es.55_tela-text-05: Entonces, guarda en tu equipaje nuestra Escalada Gerdau para recordar todo lo que hemos aprendido juntos.
es.55_tela-text-06: ¡Haz clic aquí y descarga tu recuerdo!
es.56_tela-text-01: Terminamos nuestra trayectoria juntos. Una vez más te agradezco por permitirme acompañarte. Como mi última tarea, recibe la evaluación de tu trayectoria en la Escalada Gerdau – Cultura & Estrategia. ¿Te habrás convertido en nuestro gran alpinista?
es.57_tela-text-03: ESTÁS PREPARADO PARA ESTAR JUNTO A GERDAU EN LA TRAYECTORIA ASPIRACIONAL.
es.57_tela-text-04: Como demuestran tus indicadores y tus logros, supiste tomar las mejores decisiones en los desafíos, lo que te ha ayudado a prepararte para culminar la escalada.
es.57_tela-text-05: Tenerte como ALPINISTA GERDAU – CULTURA & ESTRATEGIA es esencial para alcanzar las aspiraciones, los objetivos y plantar la bandera de Gerdau en la cima de las Montañas Futuro.
es.57_tela-text-06: ALPINISTA: puedes descargar tu premio. ¡Muéstrales tus logros a todos!
es.57_tela-text-07: ¡Vamos juntos rumbo al futuro que estamos creando!
es.57_tela-text-08: Haz clic en la X de navegador para cerrar el curso.
es.57_tela-text-12: Como demuestran tus indicadores y tus logros, has tomado algunas decisiones correctas, sin embargo podrías haber afrontado mejor los desafíos, algo que puede estorbarte cuando te prepares para continuar este viaje. ¿Qué tal revisar la trayectoria utilizando los equipos disponibles?
es.57_tela-text-13: ¿Sabes por qué necesitas volver a recorrer la trayectoria? Además de ganar el último logro, tenerte preparado como un ALPINISTA GERDAU – CULTURA & ESTRATEGIA es esencial para alcanzar las aspiraciones, los objetivos y plantar la bandera de Gerdau en la cima de las Montañas Futuro.
es.57_tela-text-14: ¿Vamos juntos a intentar otra vez la escalada y ganarnos nuestro logro?
es.57_tela-text-19: Como demuestran tus indicadores y tus logros, no siempre has sabido tomar las mejores decisiones en los desafíos, lo que terminó por dificultar tu preparación para continuar este viaje. ¿Qué tal revisar la trayectoria utilizando los equipos disponibles?
es.57_tela-text-20: ¿Sabes por qué necesitas volver a recorrer la trayectoria? Además de ganar el último logro, tenerte preparado como un ALPINISTA GERDAU – CULTURA & ESTRATEGIA es esencial para alcanzar las aspiraciones, los objetivos y plantar la bandera de Gerdau en la cima de las Montañas Futuro.
es.57_tela-text-21: ¿Vamos juntos a intentar otra vez la escalada y ganarnos nuestro logro?

en.help-text-02: In EQUIPMENT you’ll find the extra resources acquired during your journey.
en.help-text-03: In ACHIEVEMENTS, are the rewards earned during each part of your journey.
en.help-text-04: Click on each icon to access the items and rewards you've received.
en.help-text-06: This meter indicates your progress in our Gerdau Climb – Culture & Strategy. The further you advance in the adventure, the closer to being an explorer you are!
en.help-text-08: Items progressively unlocked during your journey.
en.help-text-09: Click on each one to access the enabled step.
en.equipamento-text-10: Click play to access your bonus videos.
en.quiz-neg-tentativa-01: THIS IS NOT THE CORRECT OPTION!
en.quiz-neg-tentativa-02: How about we go back, review what we’ve learned and try again?
en.02_tela-text-04:
My name is Junko and I’ll be your partner in
this adventure!
en.02_tela-text-05:
I'm here to prepare and encourage
you on our Gerdau Climb –
Culture & Strategy.
en.02_tela-text-06: Do you know why I was chosen for this adventure?
en.02_tela-text-07: Click to learn more about our honored guide.
en.02_tela-text-08: The name Junko was chosen in honor of the first woman to reach the summit of Mount Everest and the first to climb the Seven Summits (the highest mountains on each continent).
en.02_tela-text-09: Explorer Junko Tabei (1939-2016) was born in Japan, and from an early age she was already venturing into the mountains. At the age of 10, she visited the top of a volcano almost 2,000 meters high and fell in love with exploring.
en.02_tela-text-10: She became world famous in 1975 when she led the first all-female Japanese expedition to the top of the highest mountain in the world!
en.02_tela-text-11: Click to learn more about our honored guide.
en.03_tela-text-02: to the Mountain of the Future
en.03_tela-text-03: From easy trails, to rugged cliffs, to the tops of mountains, I specialize in the knowledge you'll need to successfully navigate through all the steps along the way!
en.04_tela-text-03:
We're going up the mountain along
Gerdau's Culture and Strategy path.
en.04_tela-text-05: It's going to be quite an adventure! And, you'll have an opportunity for a great achievement:
en.04_tela-text-07: That's right, to plant your flag at the top of the Mountain of the Future!
en.05_tela-text-03: Being a explorer is definitely not easy. Climbing mountains is not for everyone, since it requires:
en.05_tela-text-05: understanding complex environments, climbing techniques, and the use of specialized equipment;
en.05_tela-text-08: That means being prepared in every possible way!
en.06_tela-text-03: It's time to start! Let's get down to the rules of our game:
en.06_tela-text-04: there’ll be five stages – start with a warm-up session and then start up the mountain route;
en.06_tela-text-05: your goal – to overcome each challenge, reach the top of the highest mountain, and become a great explorer;
en.06_tela-text-06: I’m your partner – you can count on my support to overcome all challenges along the way. I’ll provide all the input you need!
en.06_tela-text-07: We're all ready to start the climb. Let's go!
en.07_tela-slide-01c: I’ve planned this journey so that you can gradually increase the difficulty of the climb, so take advantage of every opportunity along the way! We’ll meet people who will accompany us and we’ll face some challenging surprises.
en.07_tela-slide-02c: These moments are amazing! We learn from other people’s experiences and get more information to earn rewards and overcome challenges along the journey.
en.07_tela-slide-03b: It’s up here on the left side of the map. It includes the essential resources for our journey. Here you can:
en.07_tela-slide-03c: access the EQUIPMENT, the extra resources acquired during your journey;
en.07_tela-slide-03d: In ACHIEVEMENTS, are the rewards earned during each part of your journey.
en.07_tela-slide-04a: So explorer, how prepared are you for climbing the Mountain of the Future?
en.07_tela-slide-05b: I'm here to support you with that. Did you know that in the past Gerdau also needed to train and warm up to find its Purpose, its aspirations, and its culture?
en.07_tela-slide-05c: Meet me at our WARM-UP hut and let's get ourselves ready!
en.08_tela-text-01: To reach the top of the mountain, you need to be physically well prepared. Likewise, Gerdau had to research, train and adapt when the company was preparing itself for changes in the market and defining its purpose. Check-out Gerdau’s warm-up process.
en.08_tela-text-02: Click and drag or use the bottom arrows to navigate.
en.08_tela-slide1-txt: This was the year we started designing our long-term strategy and thinking about the company we wanted to be in 2022. Based on this strategy for the future, we started our cultural change.
en.08_tela-slide2-txt: We launched the Gerdau 2022 Project. We defined our business imperatives and four cultural attributes: openness, simplicity and austerity, empowerment with accountability, and leaders developing leaders.
en.08_tela-slide3-txt: We changed symbols and systems according to our new culture and repositioned Gerdau in the market as an innovative company.
en.08_tela-slide4-txt: We started the first digital transformation processes and with everything we've done so far, we’ve built a more people-focused company, more open, simple, digital, innovative, diverse, inclusive, and collaborative organization.
en.08_tela-slide5-txt:
We transformed our culture, realized the importance of our trajectory and launched the Gerdau Purpose. It represents our reason for existing and clarifies the contribution and impact that we dream to make in the world together.

It is the basis for our decision-making.
en.08_tela-slide6-txt: We revisited our long-term strategy once again, launched the Gerdau Principles and invested in operational excellence.
en.08_tela-slide7-txt:
We celebrated our 120th anniversary! And in this special year for Gerdau, we broke our historical record for results.

However, in this VUCA (volatile, uncertain, complex and ambiguous) world, we need to always pay attention to our strategy and our future, so we revisited our aspiration, and consequently, our culture.
en.08_tela-slide8-txt: We completed our first steps towards our future. We envisioned our strategy and defined our aspirations for the next 10 years. And we’ll continue developing based on the Gerdau Purpose!
en.09_tela-slide-01c: Our aspiration is to be, within ten years, one of the most profitable and admired companies in the global steel value chain, and one of the most important in the Americas.
en.09_tela-slide-01d: Your great challenge in the Gerdau Climb is to learn everything that is essential for us to reach the top of the Mountain of the Future!
en.10_tela-text-01: To further improve our physical and mental conditioning, we’ll continue our warm-up by going deeper into this aspiration. What challenges do we need to overcome to achieve it?
en.10_tela-text-02: Click and drag or use the bottom arrows to navigate.
en.10_tela-slide1-txt: Our relevance will come from strengthening our core competencies and building a portfolio with new products and complementary services to steel and adjacent businesses.
en.10_tela-slide2-txt: We will eliminate severe accidents from our environment, keeping our employees safe.
en.10_tela-slide3-txt: We will remain financially sound and our quest for competitiveness will be unrelenting.
en.10_tela-slide4-txt: We will maintain high quality and process stabilization in all our operations, since operational excellence is our foundation.
en.10_tela-slide5-txt: We will be close to our customers, anticipating their needs and generating value for each of them, always.
en.10_tela-slide6-txt: We will continue to grow in innovation and sustainability, with ESG aspects increasingly present in all decision-making and part of the way we get things done.
en.10_tela-slide7-txt: Unquestionable ethics and governance are outstanding values in a diverse team, which is engaged and prepared for any challenge.
en.10_tela-slide8-txt:
Gerdau is and will continue to be the place where people are happy and feel safe.

Living in a positive, collaborative, and inclusive environment that is conductive to learning and development is highly important to us.
en.10_tela-slide9-txt: We will maintain high-performance teams, who know the business in-depth and exceed all expectations.
en.10_tela-slide10-txt:
We will keep living our purpose of “empowering people who build the future”. Here, we truly walk the talk.

Go ahead to the challenge!
en.11_tela-quiz-title:
Explorer, it was during that same warm-up series that Gerdau found
its Purpose. Choose the correct answer: What is Gerdau’s Purpose?
en.11_tela-quiz-a: Empowering people who build the future.
en.11_tela-quiz-b: Transforming the past to build a new future.
en.11_tela-quiz-c: Gathering information from the present to be relevant in the future.
en.11_tela-quiz-d: Evolving and connecting results for a better future.
en.11_tela-quiz-pos-02:
If we think of our journey as a climb, the mountains would be our challenges. What is in our heart and drives us is our Purpose. Does this Purpose inspire you? Have you reflected on what the words “empowering people who build the future” mean?

Join us on our journey upward and we’ll find out together!
en.11_tela-quiz-neg-01:
Our Purpose is Empowering
people who build the future!
en.11_tela-quiz-neg-02:
If we think of our journey as a climb, the mountains would be our challenges. What is in our heart and drives us is our Purpose. Does this Purpose inspire you? Have you reflected on what the words “empowering people who build the future” mean?

Join us on our journey upward and we’ll find out together!
en.12_tela-text-01:
Explorer, you've earned a new piece of equipment! Go to your backpack and Click on EQUIPMENT for the “Our Purpose” video!

It’ll inspire us to climb to the top of the mountain! Watch it and learn how we can motivate ourselves to achieve our aspiration based on our Purpose!
en.13_tela-text-01: Explorer, interact with the adventurer at the base of the mountain to test your skills in empowering people to continue this journey with us.
en.14_tela-quiz-title: To reach our future aspirations and the top of the mountain, engaging people to walk this path with you is just as important as being physically well prepared. People must understand and share our Purpose to be motivated to take this journey!
en.14_tela-quiz-txt: Click on the best option to complete each sentence and engage other adventurers to join you on the journey! We know that to achieve our goals and aspirations, we need preparation, persistence, and partnership.
en.14_tela-quiz-a-txt: 1 We believe that empowered people
en.14_tela-quiz-b-alt2: all the people we interact with
en.14_tela-quiz-b-txt2: at the center of everything we do.
en.14_tela-quiz-c-txt2: is what drives us on this journey to reach the top of the Mountain of the Future.
en.14_tela-quiz-pos-02: You’ve convinced those participating in this adventure to follow the journey with you. Take the opportunity to expand your Knowledge on our Purpose to continue empowering people along our path. Talk to those who are also on the trail to learn more about the principles that guide us on this journey.
en.14_tela-quiz-neg-02: You haven’t fully convinced those on this adventure to follow the journey with you. Improve your understanding of our Purpose to empower people along our path. Talk to those who are also on the trail to learn more about the principles that guide us on this journey.
en.15_tela-text-01:
Explorer, we’ve found a few people who have contributed important information. We need to understand the principles included in our Purpose to be inspired to move forward on our climb!

Click on the people to find out more!
en.15_tela-slide1-txt:
Empowered people change realities!

We need to share knowledge and empower employees, customers, suppliers, communities, and investors. Together we can create a better world.
en.15_tela-slide2-txt:
People – employees, communities, customers, suppliers and all with whom we interact – have always been the foundation and the reason for everything we build at Gerdau!

We believe in a people-centric mindset to guide everything we do, and that is what will keep us relevant. It is through people that we reinvent ourselves and evolve.
en.15_tela-slide3-txt: The future is always ahead. When we think we have reached it, it continues to stretch out in front of us. There will always be a future to be created – a future better than today. Gerdau has this certainty embedded in its purpose. Imagine, make it happen, innovate. We want our actions to impact the world of tomorrow through learning and getting to know new technologies available in a sustainable way.
en.16_tela-text-01: You’ve received one more important piece of equipment to support you on this Culture & Strategy path: the Principles Booklet. Go to your backpack and click on EQUIPMENT to access the info.
en.17_tela-slide1-txt:
Explorer, to finish our warm-up, we need one last item: CULTURE BEHAVIORS.

Culture Behaviors are essential from a successful climb.
en.17_tela-slide2-txt:
An explorer who is overly afraid can cause accidents or see difficulties where there are none. Therefore, it’s important to know the behaviors necessary to reach the top. Practicing these culture behaviors will be essential at every stage of the climb.

Click on the highlighted sign to learn more!
en.18_tela-title:
WHAT WE NEED TO ADD TO OUR BACKPACK
These are the culture behaviors that will help us reach our aspiration, which is the top of the mountain. We’ll need the discipline to use them consistently throughout our climb.
en.18_tela-slide1-title: Our conversations are always honest and respectful
en.18_tela-slide1-txt2: We share our point of view respectfully and with transparency through deep and honest conversations. This fosters an environment where people are not afraid to express their opinions and feel safe, regardless of their position or role.
en.18_tela-slide1-txt4: We believe that listening carefully to people is a form of respect. Different approaches bring different solutions.
en.18_tela-slide2-title: We are empowered to make things happen with accountability and an ownership mindset.
en.18_tela-slide2-txt2: We don't give up easily! We think long-term, beyond immediate results. We make decisions and take responsibility for the results of those actions. We are achievers! We take plans from paper to reality.
en.18_tela-slide2-txt4: We believe that empowerment brings simplicity and agility in decision making, which is essential to remain competitive in the market.
en.18_tela-slide3-title: We raise the bar every day
en.18_tela-slide3-txt2: We dream big and do our best to achieve that dream. Here, we work together and accomplish admirable deeds.
en.18_tela-slide3-txt4: We’re always willing to learn, challenging ourselves to evolve. Therefore, we keep increasing our abilities to perform, expand our individual skills, and become a memorable team!
en.19_tela-text-01: Now that you have the three culture behaviors in your backpack and a fit body and mind, you’ve been awarded the Inspiration achievement. It’s available in your backpack.
en.20_tela-slide1-title:
Explorer, while your performance could have been better at this stage,
don't get discouraged.
en.20_tela-slide1-text-01: Access the equipment in your backpack to learn more, build on your training, and reach the top of the mountain.
en.20_tela-slide2-text-01: Now that you know where we want to go and you know in depth the Purpose that drives and motivates us on our way up, we are ready to start our journey.
en.20_tela-slide3-text-01:
On the way up the mountain, we met some people who needed guidance to get where they wanted to go.

Click on the group of climbers to interact with them.
en.21_tela-title: Explorer, there are many possible routes to climb the mountain. The best option to achieve our goals is to climb the route where Gerdau's Strategic Pillars are located. The markings on the map show how we’ll reach each Pillar. Click on the arrows to learn more about them.
en.21_tela-slide1-txt1: Continuously increase our competitiveness and grow our business in long, flat, and SBQ steel in the Americas. And, how we will get there?
en.21_tela-slide1-txt3: Discipline in our execution, consistency in our deliveries.
en.21_tela-slide1-txt4: Improving business models to create more value for our customers.
en.21_tela-slide1-txt6: Capturing digital transformation and innovation opportunities.
en.21_tela-slide2-txt1: Investing in new businesses complementary to steel. And, how we will get there?
en.21_tela-slide2-txt2: Building a new and broad portfolio of complementary steel products and services.
en.21_tela-slide3-txt1: Improving our ESG practices. And, how we will get there?
en.21_tela-slide3-txt2: Reducing the emission of gases that generate the greenhouse effect.
en.21_tela-slide3-txt3: Reducing water consumption and improving energy efficiency.
en.21_tela-slide3-txt4: Evolving the Diversity and Inclusion Social pillar.
en.22_tela-slide1-title: Explorer, YOU’VE GOT A NEW piece of equipment
en.22_tela-slide1-txt:
Access the Culture Booklet to learn more about the Strategic Pillars. These Pillars will guide you along the way and will show you how to achieve our aspiration.

Enjoy the booklet and train for the next challenge!
en.22_tela-slide2-txt:
Are you ready for the Strategic Pillars challenge?

These boulders collapsed, blocking the way, and stranding these fellow climbers without direction on how to reach our goal.

Click on the boulders for the next challenge.
en.23_tela-quiz-title: Explorer, a climbing partner is in doubt about which route to follow to improve business models and to create more value for our customers.
en.23_tela-quiz-title-b: According to the map, we should follow the strategic paths of:
en.23_tela-quiz-a: Pillar 1 to increase our competitiveness and grow our business in long, flat, and SBQ steel in the Americas.
en.23_tela-quiz-b: Pillar 2 to invest in new businesses complementary to steel.
en.23_tela-quiz-c: Pillar 3 to improve our ESG practices.
en.23_tela-quiz-d: Pillar 3 to invest in promoting and disseminating our Corporate Governance practices.
en.23_tela-quiz-pos-02: Our climbing partner followed your directions and managed to find the strategic route to reach our aspirations. Go to the map of the first pillar to increase our competitiveness and grow our business in long, flat, and SBQ steel in the Americas, in addition to checking the strategic path we have outlined to achieve our goals.
en.23_tela-quiz-neg-02: Our climbing partner followed your directions, got lost and failed to make progress on this journey to reach our aspirations. Access the Culture Booklet to learn more about how to increase our competitiveness and grow our business in long, flat, and SBQ steel in the Americas, in addition to checking the strategic path we have outlined to achieve our goals.
en.24_tela-quiz-title: Explorer, to reach the top, we need to overcome obstacles and think of innovative and creative solutions, because we don't want to get there alone! We want to encourage entrepreneurship and ensure the sustainability of our business beyond steel. In which pillar can you find the strategic path to achieve these and other objectives to expand our portfolio and promote the creation of increasingly digital and disruptive solutions?
en.24_tela-quiz-title-b: According to the map, we should follow the strategic paths of:
en.24_tela-quiz-a: Pillar 1 to increase our competitiveness and grow our business in long, flat, and SBQ steel in the Americas.
en.24_tela-quiz-b: Pillar 2 to invest in new businesses complementary to steel.
en.24_tela-quiz-c: Pillar 3 to improve our ESG practices.
en.24_tela-quiz-d: Pillar 1 to train high-performing professionals and teams.
en.24_tela-quiz-pos-02: You decided to follow the strategic path of Pillar 2 – investing in new businesses complementary to steel – to overcome the obstacles that were blocking our path. Go to the map to learn more about this pillar.
en.24_tela-quiz-neg-02: You have not followed the strategic path of Pillar 2 – investing in new businesses complementary to steel. So, you haven’t managed to overcome the obstacles blocking our path. Access the Culture Booklet to learn more about this pillar.
en.25_tela-quiz-title: Gerdau is an example of best practices in ESG. We believe that every explorer, whether an beginner or expert, needs to do the right thing and learn about the best ESG practices to climb the mountain with us. Match the information according to each of the ESG letters. Select the corresponding letters.
en.25_tela-quiz-q1: Initiatives that provide academic training for technical improvement.
en.25_tela-quiz-q2: Adapting the organizational structure to ensure solidity, legal compliance and ethical alignment.
en.25_tela-quiz-pos-02: You did the right thing and cleared the path to strategic Pillar 3. Access the map to learn more about our ESG practices.
en.25_tela-quiz-neg-02: Access the Culture Booklet to learn more about our ESG practices.
en.26_tela-slide1-text-01:
Explorer, we’ve managed to direct our climbing partners to the Strategic Pillars route. We successfully finished our trekking stage!

You’ve been awarded the Path achievement and it’s available in your backpack.
en.26_tela-slide2-title:
Explorer, while your performance could have been better at this stage,
don't get discouraged.
en.26_tela-slide2-text-01: Access the equipment in your backpack to learn more, build on your training, and reach the top of the mountain.
en.26_tela-slide3-text-01: Explorer, we have reached the technical climbing stage. From now on, we'll take the steepest and most decisive routes to reach the top of the mountain.
en.26_tela-slide4-text-01: Climbing is an admirable feat, but it requires a lot of physical and mental preparation to overcome the obstacles that arise along the way. So, the more prepared you are, the greater your chances of success on this journey will be. Click CLIMB to start the challenge.
en.27_tela-text-01: While climbing a mountain is extremely rewarding, we know this is no easy task. It’s important to be prepared to face the heat, the cold, the wind, and many other obstacles that may arise during our journey. Likewise, Gerdau has also prepared itself to overcome the challenges and reach the top of the mountain.
en.27_tela-text-02: Click on the icons and learn about the decisive factors that will help us achieve our aspiration.
en.27_tela-text-03: People capable of performing admirable feats and prepared for the future.
en.27_tela-text-04: Execution with excellence is what makes the difference in our results.
en.27_tela-text-05: Positive and outstanding experiences for our customers.
en.27_tela-text-06: Our goal is to build high-performing teams that live our purpose and principles and develop themselves as well as their colleagues. Admirable feats go beyond results and numbers. Admirable feats mean eliminating accidents, having a positive impact on society, continuously empowering people, and building a better future. We will recognize talents and help them reach their full potential. Every human being is unique and has a singular way of contributing, so we value each person and their individuality. Diversity, inclusion, and equity are essential to us.
en.27_tela-text-07: To be even more competitive, we need to be excellent at executing our roadmaps and investments, delivering connection with our strategy. We need to keep ourselves in balance so that short-term execution does not conflict with our long-term goals. We will need to be agile and simple, open to the new, while striving for excellence. Success in fulfillment will come from operational excellence. It demands discipline in the routine, teamwork, management tools, technology, and openness, both for continuous improvement and innovation in our processes.
en.27_tela-text-08: Check out your bonus: “Execution with Excellence” video, which is in your backpack.
en.27_tela-text-09: Delivering a concrete perception of value and experience from the beginning to the end of our customers’ journey with Gerdau is the key to conquering their loyalty to our brand. Therefore, our objective will be to provide the best customer experience. To reach this goal, we will invest in training our teams, in the development of new products and services, and in the intense use of technologies and tools, always aiming to improve our customers' journey and experience.
en.28_tela-text-01: Explorer, now that you´ve learned about the decisive success factors, you’re ready for the next challenges. Choose the decisive factors which can help you overcome the obstacles that could arise in your journey. Click Confirm after selecting each factor and check how you performed in the end.
en.28_tela-text-02: 1. To be even more competitive, we need to stay connected with our strategy. Keeping ourselves in balance so that short-term goals don’t conflict with our long-term goals is essential to achieving success along the way. With this in mind, what is the decisive factor that can help you succeed at this stage of the climb?
en.28_tela-text-03: People capable of performing admirable feats and prepared for the future
en.28_tela-text-04: Execution with excellence is what makes the difference in our results
en.28_tela-text-05: Positive and outstanding experiences for our customers
en.28_tela-text-08: You used the decisive factors to your advantage and made an excellent climbing achievement. To help maintain your performance, you can revisit the tips and guidelines available in your backpack.
en.28_tela-text-11: How about we go back, review what we’ve learned and try again?
en.28_tela-text-14: You didn’t perform well on the climb and put the safety of all explorers at risk. Please check your backpack for some tips and guidelines that will help you improve your performance.
en.29_tela-text-02: 2. Before climbing the mountain, we need to check our equipment to eliminate the risk of accidents and ensure the safety of all those with us. This is about an admirable achievement performed in the present that prepares us for the future. In addition, explorers know that as rewarding as climbing might be, you shouldn't do it alone. With this in mind, what is the decisive factor that can help you succeed at this stage of the climb?
en.30_tela-text-02: 3. Our success comes from the experience and perception of value that we provide to those with us throughout the journey. That is why we’ll train our teams in the intensive use of technologies and tools to provide a positive and remarkable experience along the journey. Considering this, what is the decisive factor that can help you succeed at this stage of the climb?
en.31_tela-slide1-title:
Explorer, YOUR PERFORMANCE was
excellent!
en.31_tela-slide1-text-01: You’ve been awarded another piece of equipment. It’s available in your backpack.
en.31_tela-slide2-title:
Explorer, while your performance could have been better at this stage,
don't get discouraged.
en.31_tela-slide2-text-01: Access the equipment in your backpack to learn more, build on your training, and reach the top of the mountain.
en.31_tela-slide3-text-01: Oops, you’ve dropped your GPS device. It’s broken and some parts rolled down the wall! Without your GPS device, you can't tell if you're on the right track. Click on CLIMBING WALL to retrieve the missing parts of your GPS.
en.32_tela-text-01: This is where the missing parts of your GPS device are located, explorer. We're going to have to climb this wall to get them. Click on each of them to solve the challenges.
en.33_tela-text-01: Before starting to climb, pay attention to the
en.33_tela-text-03: There is a sign warning about risk of accidents due to falls on this part of our route. At Gerdau we also have this type of sign, which shows our concern for people's safety. The tireless work to keep everyone safe is in “our DNA” and this is shown by the Severity Rate, one of our success KPIs.
en.34_tela-text-03: Therefore, they are used to measure the success of our evolution on our way up and to be sure we have our priorities right. We use five KPIs in total. Learning about each one of them will provide you with the correct route to achieve our future aspirations.
en.35_tela-text-01: Gerdau’s aspiration is to ensure a safe environment. The Severity Rate, used to measure safety levels, is one of our safety KPIs. To retrieve this first missing part of our GPS, choose the image that best reflects Gerdau's care for people's safety, and which contributes to the success of this KPI.
en.35_tela-quiz-pos-02: Write this down: our aspiration is to have a safe environment. The Severity Rate, our safety KPI, measures the degree of severity of LTAs (lost time accidents) and fatalities. It represents the number of days employees and contractors were absent from work proportionate to 1,000,000 hours worked for the period analyzed.
en.35_tela-quiz-pos-03: We want to be a Zero Fatality company in the near future. Ensuring the physical well-being of people, following the strictest practices, and creating a safety-oriented culture is one of our priorities.
en.35_tela-quiz-pos-04: You have unlocked a bonus. Go ahead and find out!
en.35_tela-quiz-neg-01:
We still need to
retrieve the antenna…
en.35_tela-quiz-neg-02: Gerdau’s aspiration is to ensure a safe environment. The Severity Rate, our safety KPI, measures the degree of severity of LTAs (lost time accidents) and fatalities. It represents the number of days employees and contractors were absent from work proportionate to 1,000,000 hours worked for the period analyzed.
en.35_tela-quiz-neg-03: Watch the Zero Fatality video below and learn more about this topic.
en.36_tela-text-03:
As in any type of climbing, the wall climbing modality also has its rules, but it’s essential to maintain concentration and focus on the result.

For Gerdau, Results is considered one of our KPIs – the EBITDA. Do you know what this acronym means?
en.37_tela-text-02: EBITDA stands for “Earnings Before Interest, Taxes, Depreciation and Amortization”. It refers to the cash profit generated by the company’s operations. The higher a company's EBITDA, the higher its market value tends to be.
en.38_tela-text-01:
Our second GPS device part is nearby! Choose from the calendar below the year in which Gerdau achieved its highest EBITDA in history. This has actually consolidated our growth strategy and leveraged the Gerdau culture check we visited back in our
warm-up stage.
en.38_tela-quiz-pos-02: We aim to be one of the most profitable and admired companies of the global steel value chain in the world, and one of the most important in the Americas, and we will continue to grow in an innovative and sustainable way.
en.38_tela-quiz-neg-01:
there’s still another part of the
GPS device yet to be recovered...
en.38_tela-quiz-neg-02: We aim to be one of the most profitable and admired companies of the global steel value chain in the world, and one of the most important in the Americas, and we will continue to grow in an innovative and sustainable way.
en.38_tela-quiz-neg-03: Here's another tip: the year of the historic EBITDA was the same as Gerdau's 120th anniversary!
en.39_tela-text-01: That’s great! This part of the GPS is easy to recover! On a scale of 0 to 10, how likely are you to recommend this climbing company's service to a friend or colleague?
en.39_tela-quiz-pos-02: What you’ve just answered is the NPS, or Net Promoter Score, which is your level of customer satisfaction with our services. It’s also one of the KPIs we use to guide our success.
en.39_tela-quiz-pos-03: NPS is a loyalty measurement, based on a single question of how likely customers are to recommend your product or service to others on a scale of 0-10.
en.40_tela-text-02: By looking at the survey results, we can find out if customers are:
en.40_tela-text-03: Promoters - scores 9 and 10. They are likely to present value-creating behaviors such as making recurring purchases, remaining customers longer, and making positive referrals to other potential customers.
en.41_tela-text-01: Detractors - scores 0 to 6. They are less likely to exhibit value-creating behaviors.
en.41_tela-text-02: Passive or neutral - scores 7 and 8. Their behavior falls in between promoters and detractors. They do not directly affect the overall net result.
en.41_tela-text-03: To calculate your NPS score, you subtract the percentage of detractors from the percentage of promoters.
en.42_tela-text-03: To have satisfied and loyal customers, keeping them at the center, we need to constantly monitor their satisfaction levels, and the NPS is one of the possible metrics to check whether we are on the right track or not.
en.42_tela-text-04: We want to keep raising the bar in all our operations!
en.43_tela-text-01: I'm really curious today! You can easily recover one more piece of the GPS! From 0 to 10 and considering that I’m your leader on this climb, what score will you give to my ability to develop people?
en.43_tela-quiz-pos-02: What you’ve just answered was the Leadership eNPS, which is an adaptation of the Net Promoter Score. It’s also one of the KPIs we use to guide Gerdau's success for our 10-year aspiration.
en.43_tela-quiz-pos-03: We use it to measure the teams' perception of their direct leaders and their role in employee development. Whether the leader provides the team with opportunities to learn new things, gives feedback, shares their knowledge, involves the team in challenging projects, among others.
en.44_tela-text-02: If we want a business of excellence, we aspire to maintain high-performing teams that have a deep understanding of the business and exceed all expectations. This is only achieved with prepared and highly engaged people, and with leaders who empower and develop people.
en.44_tela-text-03: You've earned another piece of equipment!
en.44_tela-text-04: Click on Equipment to access the video.
en.45_tela-text-02: Polluting the environment is completely against the ethics of climbing, explorer! Caring for the environment is in “our DNA”, so we need to retrieve this battery.
en.45_tela-text-03: At Gerdau, caring for the environment is practiced by considering ESG aspects in business decision-making.
en.46_tela-text-01: It's time to get the last part of our GPS device back: the battery. To recover it, please choose the statement below which includes part of an ESG KPI?
en.46_tela-quiz-pos-02: Write this down: to be an example of good sustainability practices, with ESG aspects increasingly present in all decision-making. Our KPI to measure this is “CO<sub>2</sub> emission reduction”.
en.46_tela-quiz-pos-03: You have unlocked a bonus. Go ahead and find out!
en.46_tela-quiz-neg-01: we still need to recover the BATTERY…
en.46_tela-quiz-neg-02: Write this down: to be an example of good sustainability practices, with ESG aspects increasingly present in all decision-making. . Our KPI is the reduction of emissions of greenhouse gasses.
en.46_tela-quiz-neg-03: Watch the ESG-Biocoke video below to better understand the topic.
en.47_tela-slide-01a: It’s great that you managed to get the GPS device back. It’ll be essential to keep us on the right track to reach the top of the mountain.
en.47_tela-slide-01b: You’ve been awarded another achievement. You'll find it in your backpack.
en.47_tela-slide-02a:
Explorer, while your performance could have been better at this stage,
don't get discouraged.
en.47_tela-slide-02b: Access the equipment in your backpack to learn more, build on your training, and reach the top of the mountain.
en.47_tela-slide-03a: Explorer, we’ve arrived at a part of the mountain where we’ll need courage and resilience to deal with those aspects we cannot control, such as unforeseen events of nature and climate change.
en.47_tela-slide-04a: To be able to deal with these challenges, you’ll need the essential cultural behaviors that we packed in the warm-up stage. Have you noticed how important they’ve been throughout your journey so far?
en.47_tela-slide-05a: Now, let's use the cultural behaviors in our big challenge: the exploring stage. Ready to plant the flag at the top?
en.47_tela-slide-05b: Click on EXPLORING and take on the ultimate challenge.

en.51_tela-text-01: Awesome, explorer! We've reached the top of the mountain! You now have in your backpack all the knowledge you'll need to contribute to Gerdau on its cultural and strategic climb.
en.52_tela-text-01:
By fulfilling our aspiration to reach the top of the mountain, you’ve unlocked your last video. Your backpack is complete!

Click on Equipment to access the video.
en.52_tela-text-02: Explorer, it’s been a pleasure to be with you on this cultural journey!
en.52_tela-text-03: You’ve received one more achievement as a final reward. Please check your backpack.
en.52_tela-text-04: Explorer, while your performance could have been better at this stage,
en.52_tela-text-06: To build on your training and reach the top of the mountain, improve your understanding by accessing the equipment in your backpack.
en.52a_tela-text-01: How about a look back at your journey? Click on our flag to check your performance.
en.53_tela-text-03: You’ve already seen that if we think of our journey as a climb, the mountain would be our challenges.
en.53_tela-text-04: What is in our heart and drives us is our Purpose.
en.53_tela-text-05: To be able to climb this mountain, we need to carry these decisive factors in our backpack.
en.53_tela-text-06:
The
Strategic Pillars is the route we’ll take. They exemplify how we reach our goal.
en.53_tela-text-07: To succeed, we’ll also need to add new culture behaviors to our backpack.
en.53_tela-text-08: We’ll know if we’re on the right track by monitoring our KPIs. They’ll be our GPS, showing us if we are on track toward our goal.
en.54_tela-text-04: is to be, within ten years, one of the most profitable and admired companies in the global steel value chain, and one of the most important in the Americas.
en.55_tela-text-04: Building our aspiration for the future together is like our climb: our challenge doesn’t end with the first mountain. We have several mountains to climb, one after the other.
en.55_tela-text-05: So, keep our Gerdau Climb in your backpack to remember all that we’ve learned together.
en.55_tela-text-06: EXPLORER: you can download your reward. You can be proud of your achievements!
en.56_tela-text-01: We’ve completed our journey together. Thank you for sharing the adventure ! My last task is to give you my assessment of your trajectory at the Gerdau Climb – Culture & Strategy. Have you become our great climber?
en.57_tela-text-03: YOU ARE READY TO JOIN GERDAU ON YOUR ASPIRATIONAL JOURNEY.
en.57_tela-text-04: As your KPIs and achievements show, you made the best decisions in each challenge, which helped you finish the climb.
en.57_tela-text-05: Having you as a GERDAU CLIMBER - CULTURE & STRATEGY is fundamental to achieving our aspirations, our goals, and to plant the Gerdau flag at the top of the Mountain of the Future.
en.57_tela-text-06: Click here and download your bagde!
en.57_tela-text-07: Let's move toward the future we are creating together!
en.57_tela-text-08: Click on the X in your browser to close the course.
en.57_tela-text-12: As your KPIs and achievements show, you’ve made some good decisions, but you could have done better with the challenges. This could get in the way of continuing this journey. How about using the equipment you have available to review the journey?
en.57_tela-text-13: Do you know why you need to redo your journey? Besides winning the last achievement, having you as a GERDAU CLIMBER - CULTURE & STRATEGY is fundamental to achieve our aspirations, our goals, and to plant the Gerdau flag on top of the Mountain of the Future.
en.57_tela-text-14: Let’s try the climb together again and accomplish this achievement!
en.57_tela-text-19: As your KPIs and your achievements show, you didn't always make the best decisions in all of the challenges, which hindered your preparation to continue this journey. How about reviewing the journey using the equipment available?

en.57_tela-text-21: Let’s try the climb together again and accomplish this achievement!
